name: Lemmy vs Zombies
description:
Lemmy vs Zombies is an isometric shooter game in 8-bit style. Old school pixel art graphics of Lemmy vs Zombies is inspired by 8-bit games from nintendo consoles. The game rule is simple – shoot the crowds of zombies and survive as long as you can! Use W,A,S,D to move and mouse left button to fire. This game template created using Construct 2. 

Buy the game source (CAPX file).
